description.p: The new FSFE hoodies are produced only for those who will order them and will be self picked up only. As the are self picked-up, there are no shipping fee for orders that include one or more hoodies. You can combine them with other items from this shop for the same pick up location.

p.strong: This item is for self-pick up at the FSFE booth at FOSDEM 2025 only.

description.p: On the front the FSFE logo will be printed on the upper left side.
